name: df-pmtr
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cpmtr, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, crab(s2, cpw(cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), cen, c2o)), cmpt(s3, cv(s0), cif(cuni(cdif(cv(s1), csn(cv(s3)))), cv(s3), wcel(cv(s3), cv(s1)))))))
comment: Define a function that generates the transpositions on a set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 16-Aug-2015.)
